ctx: intros s0 s1 c p H.
tactic: destruct s0 as [|a0 p0 s00 s01].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s0 s1 : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit s0 s1) c = Some p -> exists p0 p1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1

ad = N : Set
state = Map prec_list : Set
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
s_produit = fix s_produit (s0 s1 : state) {struct s1} : state := match s0 with | @M0 _ => match s1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 prec_list end | @M1 _ a0 p0 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a1 p1 => s_produit_l a0 p0 (M1 prec_list a1 p1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => s_produit_l a0 p0 (M2 prec_list s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a1 p1 => s_produit_r a1 p1 (M2 prec_list s00 s01) | @
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
s_produit_0 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit s0 s1) c = Some (pl_produit p0 p1)
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop

sproductl_1 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1
sproductl_1_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 : state -> Prop

dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop

sproductl_0 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1)

prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
sproductl_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1) : state -> Prop
sproductr_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r1 r0) : state -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
sproductl_0_0 = fun (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list) (_ : MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0) (H0 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1) => let H1 : Some r1 = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p (M0 prec_list)) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1) := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p (M0 prec_list)) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1)) with | eq_refl => fun H1 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1 => (fun H2 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1 => let H3 : False := eq_ind...

```coq
intros s0 s1 c p H.
destruct s0 as [|a0 p0 s00 s01].
- destruct s1 as [|a1 p1 s10 s11].
  + inversion H.
  + exists p, p. split; auto.
  + inversion H.
  + exists p, p. split; auto.
- destruct s1 as [|a1 p1 s10 s11].
  + inversion H.
  + apply sproductl_1 in H.
    destruct H as [r0 [r1 [H0 H1]]].
    exists r0, r1. split; auto.
  + apply sproductl_1 in H.
    destruct H as [r0 [r1 [H0 H1]]].
    exists r0, r1. split; auto.
  + apply sproductl_1 in H.
    destruct H as [r0 [r1 [H0 H1]]].
    exists r0, r1. split; auto.
Qed.
